name: Neovim (from appimage releases)
description: A feature to install Neovim from appimage

version.description: The version of Neovim to be installed (stable, nightly or a specific version in the format 'MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH' e.g. '0.9.5)

neovimReleaseRepo.description: The repo to pull the release appimage from. The name has to be nvim.appimage!
